summary: Build a modern, professional, trustworthy, SEO-optimized website for the Indian tax consultancy firm “Online Tax Consultant”, featuring clear service pages, strong CTAs, testimonials, FAQs, a blog, and a contact form with WhatsApp integration.
architectural_notes: Use a clean, corporate visual style with a blue/white palette and subtle green accents to convey trust and financial growth.
SEO-first information architecture: use proper H1/H2 heading hierarchy and include meta tags per page.
Include conversion-focused CTAs prominently across key pages (consultation/ITR filing/talk to expert).
Contact workflow should support WhatsApp as a primary quick-contact channel.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Minimal corporate logo mark with wordmark “Online Tax Consultant” in blue/white with subtle green accent (otc-logo.dim_512x256.png)
- Clean abstract finance-themed hero background with subtle geometric shapes in blue/white/green (hero-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)
- Set of 7 simple outline-style service icons consistent in stroke and color accents (service-icons-sprite.dim_1024x1024.png)

existing_features.title: Create a clean, modern, corporate visual theme for the “Online Tax Consultant” website using blue and white as primary colors with subtle green accents; apply the theme consistently across typography, spacing, layout, and component styles for a trustworthy financial-services look.

Implement site-wide navigation and routing for these pages: Home, Services (overview), individual Service detail pages (7 services), Pricing, Testimonials, Blog, Contact, Privacy Policy, and Terms & Conditions.

Build the Home page using the provided SEO-optimized content, including: the exact H1 “Online Tax Consultant – Trusted Tax Filing & GST Experts in India”, the provided intro paragraph, and a prominent CTA area that includes the three bullet CTAs (File ITR in Minutes, Get GST Registration in 3 Days, Free Tax Consultation Available).

Add strong, persistent call-to-action buttons across the site (at minimum in hero/header and at relevant sections): “Book Free Consultation”, “File Your ITR Now”, and “Talk to Tax Expert”, each linking to the Contact page and/or opening the WhatsApp flow (as applicable).

Create a Services overview page listing all 7 services with short summaries, key benefits, and internal links to dedicated service detail pages; include the provided SEO keywords and the provided service-specific content for each service detail page.

Add an About/Why Choose Us section using the provided About Us text, the provided target keywords, and the “Why Choose Us” bullet list; place it on the Home page and/or as part of a dedicated About section within the Home page.

Create a Testimonials section (and dedicated Testimonials page) featuring multiple testimonials relevant to Indian individuals and small businesses; ensure the section is professionally styled and includes a CTA.

Create an FAQ section using the 5 provided FAQ questions and supply clear, professional answers tailored to the services offered; place the FAQ section on the Home page and optionally on Services/Contact pages as well.

Implement a Contact page with a contact form (name, email/phone, service interested in, message) and WhatsApp integration via a WhatsApp click-to-chat link; submitting the form must show a success/failure state in the UI.

Implement SEO basics across the site: set the provided Meta Title, Meta Description, and Meta Keywords; ensure each page has a clear H1 and appropriate H2 section headings; ensure service pages contain keyword-rich content matching the provided keyword sets.

Create a Blog page with a list of at least 6 starter posts (Tax Saving Tips, ITR Updates, GST Rules themes) and individual blog post pages with readable formatting; content can be static (no CMS required).

Create a Pricing page with clear, professional pricing tiers for at least: ITR filing, GST filing, and Business registration; include disclaimers that final pricing may vary by complexity and a CTA to contact/WhatsApp for a quote.

Add Privacy Policy and Terms & Conditions pages with professional, generic content suitable for an Indian online tax consultancy website (no external integrations implied) and include these links in the site footer.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create clean, corporate website UI using blue/white with subtle green accents for “Online Tax Consultant” targeting Indian individuals and small businesses
Homepage with SEO-optimized H1/H2 content and prominent CTAs (Book Free Consultation, File Your ITR Now, Talk to Tax Expert)
Service pages for ITR filing, GST registration & filing, business registration, tax planning & advisory, TDS return filing, accounting & bookkeeping, notice & compliance handling
Add FAQ section with provided questions
Implement SEO basics: meta title/description/keywords, proper headings, and keyword-rich content
Add additional pages: Blog, Pricing, Privacy Policy, Terms & Conditions, Contact

Add backend support to store contact form submissions (“leads”) in the single Motoko actor, including creating a lead record with timestamp and returning an acknowledgement; expose query methods to list leads for admin/debug purposes (no public admin UI required).
